subject: AI & Agents
title: AI Voice Acting: Characters That Never Existed
description: A fast breakdown of AI Voice Acting: Characters That Never Existed for builders.

hook.text: A video game features 500 unique NPCs, each with a distinct voice. None of them are human actors.

buildup.text: AI voice synthesis can generate thousands of unique voices with emotional range and natural delivery.

discovery.text: Game studios use AI voices for background characters, freeing budget for key performances by human actors.

twist.text: Voice actors fear replacement. SAG-AFTRA's 2023 strike included AI voice protections as a key demand.

climax.text: The compromise emerging: AI for scale, humans for soul. But the line keeps shifting.

punchline.text: Five hundred voices, zero vocal cords. The cast that never existed.

quiz.question: Why did voice actors push for AI protections in their union contracts?
options: AI voice synthesis could replace human voice acting at scale
AI voices sound worse than humans in every case
Voice actors wanted to use AI themselves
